title: Managed File Transfer (MFT) Dashboard & Infrastructure
desc: Building a Streamlit-based internal dashboard for FICO's Managed File Transfer platform to enable real-time file transfer monitoring and workflow management.
highlights: Leading frontend development using Python Streamlit
Designing AWS infrastructure (load balancing, auto-scaling, Docker-based deployment)
Integrating backend APIs via AWS API Gateway (GET/POST/PUT workflows)
Enabling real-time monitoring and workflow initialization for internal teams
